ygData.subject: Re: Pred Base
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Thank you Phobia, she said in a low tone, but I heard them ask Terrorsaur to lead them. I can not lead if others do not wish to follow. She walked to her

::KitKat::

"Thank you Phobia,"she said in a low tone,"but I heard them ask 
Terrorsaur to lead them. I can not lead if others do not wish to 
follow." She walked to her bed and sat down with her head hung down.
"And no one saw me,except maybe you." She sighed, "I just don't know 
what's wrong with me.  I'm no leader.  I just do what I think is good 
for me and the team.  Megatron is the real leader of our group.  he's 
the one who is programmed for it. I'm....I'm just a soldier and 
nothing more.  I've followed leaders to the inferno and back.  But  
lead by different means.  I care about the group I'm in.  I haven't 
seen another leader do that before." she sighs "And even if I could 
take over the ship, there is always the chance Megatron would label 
me a traitor and kill me, take the ship anyway and I'd be dead."  She 
layed back on the bed and put her hands behind her head. "Sometimes I 
wonder if I'm even Predacon material."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Phobia met her at her room looking at the way she carried 
> herself. "Pick your head up, you can't let the troops see an unsure 
> leader now can we?" he intended to keep pushing the word into her 
> head until she was convinced. KitKat was the best candidate for the 
> job since Darkmouse had disappeared. "You command well, you handled 
> things devinely back there, you should be proud." The last part 
he'd 
> meant he was impressed.
>
